movies.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.description: A man tries to erase the memories of his failed relationship with a groundbreaking procedure.

movies.name: The Science of Sleep
movies.description: A man's dream world blends with reality, blurring the lines between the two.

movies.name: Be Kind Rewind
movies.description: Two friends create low-budget remakes of popular movies after accidentally erasing all the tapes in a video rental store.

movies.name: Mood Indigo
movies.description: A woman's illness affects her life and the love she shares with her partner.

movies.name: The Green Hornet
movies.description: A newspaper publisher teams up with his martial artist friend to become a masked crime-fighting duo.

movies.name: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
movies.description: A documentary film about a block party organized by Dave Chappelle featuring musical and comedy performances.

movies.name: Microbe & Gasoline
movies.description: Two young friends embark on a road trip in a homemade car.

movies.name: The We and the I
movies.description: A group of high school students navigate their way home on the last day of school.

movies.name: Human Nature
movies.description: A story that explores the intersection of science, ethics, and human behavior.

movies.name: Is the Man Who Is Tall Happy?
movies.description: An animated conversation between filmmaker Michel Gondry and linguist Noam Chomsky.
